rundown: 3-9 L vs San Francisco Giants Spencer Strider: 5.0 innings, 3 earned runs, 5 hits, 2 HR, 7 strikeouts Batters: Drake Baldwin (1 hits - 3 AB, 0 HR, 2 RBI) Jurickson Profar (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) Eli White (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) The Braves fell to the San Francisco Giants with a score of 3-9. The loss was attributed to a combination of missed opportunities and a strong offensive performance from the Giants. Key highlights from the game include: 1. Spencer Strider recorded 7 strikeouts but allowed 3 earned runs over 5 innings. 2. Drake Baldwin contributed significantly with 2 RBIs despite only having 1 hit. 3. Jurickson Profar and Eli White each had 2 hits, helping to keep the Braves competitive. 4. The Giants capitalized on their chances, hitting 2 home runs and scoring 9 runs overall. 5. The Braves managed 7 hits but struggled to convert them into runs.
